titles.title: Reaffirming the trade and investment partnership between the United States and the European Union is critical to the economic and national security of the United States.
Reaffirming the trade and investment partnership between the United States and the European Union is critical to the economic and national security of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Reaffirms that the trade and investment partnership between the United States and the European Union is critical to the economic and national security of the United States.
Urges the President to prioritize the principles of fair trade in commercial relationships and to immediately issue a permanent exemption from steel and aluminum import tariffs for the European Union.
